description:
ShopSavvy is your one-stop resource to save time and money and to get all the best sales from your favorite stores. 
 
ShopSavvy is the #1 app for the deals helping you find the best online & local prices along with the unbiased and neutral information. Now ShopSavvy saves you even more time and Money!  All the sales from the tip retailers and brands are in one place.  You will never have to check multiple shopping apps or retailer websites.  With just a few quick taps, narrow your search down to types of deals you like to get– then sit relax and let the huge discounts come to you in real time!
 
With ShopSavvy, you can:
 
- Scan or Search for products to find the lowest prices!
- Read product details and see how much you can save right away.
- Enable alerts on any search and get notified whenever there are new deals just for you.
- Browse our comprehensive list of sales from hundreds of the top retailers and big brands, updated in real time.
trackCensoredName: ShopSavvy - All the Sales in One Place - Search Products and Match Prices -  Barcode Scanner and QR Bar Code Reader!
trackName: ShopSavvy - All the Sales in One Place - Search Products and Match Prices -  Barcode Scanner and QR Bar Code Reader!
releaseNotes:
- NEW: Improved sharing of products and lists

- FIXED: An issue that could sometimes cause the barcode scanner to appear as a black screen. Note: If you're having this issue, make sure you've allowed ShopSavvy access to your camera in Settings.
- FIXED: A screen orientation issue that could affect some iPad users.
- FIXED: NEW items from SmartAlerts now properly designated as new.

========== New in 9.0.0: ========== 

ShopSavvy is back with a *huge* update just in time for the holiday shopping season!

We've simplified the entire app and added some amazing new features to help you save even more time and money!

NEW: Never miss a sale from any of your favorite stores with the all-new and improved Sales tab. Check back every day to find the latest online sales from all stores in one place.

NEW: Our new Tags feature will let you quickly find great sales that fit your needs.

NEW: Get alerted the second a new sale happens with our brand new SmartAlerts Service! 

Here's how it works: Anytime you're searching around in the app you can enable alerts for your search, ShopSavvy will then keep an eye out and let you know the second anything new goes on sale matching your search. You'll never miss out on a great deal ever again!

IMPROVED: We've listened to your feedback and simplified things throughout the entire app, with a focus on the features that will help save you money. The app now consists of only two tabs and we've removed the need to have an account to access most features.

NEW: This release is a huge one for our iPad users, now when running ShopSavvy on an iPad you now get ALL of the same great features that are available on iPhone. 

IMPROVED: Scanning barcodes on iPad devices has been improved significantly. Barcodes are now recognized up to 50% faster and the scanner is now much easier to use.

And of course, as always, ShopSavvy is still the #1 barcode scanning and price comparison app in the world.

We are very excited to bring you these improvements and new features, and we think you're really going to love it.

Have you saved money with ShopSavvy? We'd love to hear your story! Leave a review on the App Store and tell us how ShopSavvy has helped you!
